title: Benjamin Bear in Fuzzy Thinking: Toon Books Level 2
description: The silly logic of a very serious bear!Benjamin Bear does everything in his own funny way, whether it's drying dishes on a rabbitâ€™s back or throwing a ball at a friend to make him play. In this series of gags starring a very loopy bear, Philippe Coudray creates a zany world that makes kids think and solve puzzles, drawing all readers into the game.
author: Philippe Coudray
